citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00pm on 04 MAR
2022.
Inspector arrived at 2 pm and found nobody at facility. Contacted family member by phone who stated no responsible
adult was available for inspection on that day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00pm on 04 MAR 
2022. 
 
Inspector arrived at 2 pm and found nobody at facility.  Contacted family member by phone who stated no responsible 
adult was available for inspection on that day. 
 
 
 
End Section
